name: ClinicalOralEvaluation
title: Clinical Oral Evaluation
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters for clinical oral evaluations.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter for periodic or limited (problem focused) or comprehensive oral evaluations and re-evaluations.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

contains.display: oral evaluation for a patient under three years of age and counseling with primary caregiver
comprehensive oral evaluation - new or established patient
detailed and extensive oral evaluation - problem focused, by report
re-evaluation - limited, problem focused (established patient; not post-operative visit)
comprehensive periodontal evaluation - new or established patient
